```{r abricate_vfdb}

vfgDesc_raw = read_tsv( "./abricate_vfdb_summary.tsv" )


vfgDesc_raw %>% head()


vfgDesc = vfgDesc_raw %>%
  select( GENE, ACCESSION, PRODUCT, RESISTANCE ) %>% 
  unique() %>% 
  filter( GENE != "GENE" ) %>%
  mutate( SRC = "vfdb")
```
